caption: A powerful female pop anthem with punchy drums, bright synth hooks, and confident belting vocals. The production features modern pop production techniques, catchy melodic hooks, and an empowering message of self-love and independence.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Used to dim my light for you
Bend and break to make it through
But I found my voice again
This is where my story begins

[Pre-Chorus]
No more playing small
I'm ready to stand tall

[Chorus]
I'm a queen in my own right
Watch me shine so bright
Don't need your crown
I built my own
I'm a queen in my own right

[Verse 2]
Every scar made me strong
Knew my worth all along
Now I walk with my head high
Touch the clouds in the sky

[Pre-Chorus]
No more playing small
I'm ready to stand tall

[Chorus]
I'm a queen in my own right
Watch me shine so bright
Don't need your crown
I built my own
I'm a queen in my own right

[Bridge]
To every girl who feels unseen
You're already a queen
Believe in who you are
You're gonna go far

[Final Chorus]
I'm a queen in my own right
Watch me shine so bright
I'm a queen in my own right

[Outro]
Yeah, I'm a queen
